mapper.select: select * from ( SELECT concat('https://www.chendd.cn/blog/article/' , id , '.html') loc , ifnull(updateTime , createTime) lastmod, 'yearly' changefreq , '0.8' priority from blog_article t where ascription = 'Content' and dataStatus = 'USABLE' union all select concat('https://www.chendd.cn/blog/article/type/' , menuId , '.html') loc , ifnull(updateDate , createDate) lastmod, 'yearly' changefreq , '0.5' priority from sys_menu a where a.menuKey like '#blog_web_menu%' and dataStatus = 'USABLE' ) newTab order by priority desc , lastmod
